overview: With a meteor set to strike and destroy earth in a mere 12 hours, lecherous married couple Violet and Aaron, and their more conservative counterparts Ruth and Andrew have gathered at the formerâ€™s mansion for an extended stretch of debauchery before everything, and everyone, is annihilated. The impending meteor has set off a punishing heatwave, and everyone is oddly relaxed because the reality of the situation has not sunk in.
title: Out with a Bang
